item.title: Tech could see a rebound soon. How to play it while hedging against potential downside
item.description: March Madness (in markets) is hopefully coming to an end.

item.title: Here are Friday's biggest analyst calls of the day: Netflix, Tesla, Nike, Meta, Disney, Ferrari and more
item.description: Here are Friday's biggest calls on Wall Street.

item.title: Deutsche Bank slashes Tesla price target as first-quarter deliveries come under pressure
item.description: Deutsche Bank sees "material downside" to Tesla's current-quarter deliveries.

item.title: Barclays upgrades Ferrari, sees attractive entry point after recent pullback
item.description: Ferrari has demonstrated its ability to remain resilient in the face of President Donald Trump's latest auto tariffs, Barclays said.

item.title: Jefferies upgrades this chip stock due to low China exposure compared to peers
item.description: The bank upgraded the semiconductor manufacturer to buy from hold.
